text: Surselva is a district of the canton of Graubünden, Switzerland. It has an area of 1,373.39 km² and a population of 22,381 people (as of December 2004). It contains 5 Kreise (sub-districts) and 43 municipalities: Disentis sub-district Municipality Population (31 Dec 2004) Area (km²) Breil/Brigels 1,323 50.84 Disentis/Mustér 2,166 91.08 Medel (Lucmagn) 480 136.20 Schlans 96 8.83 Sumvitg 1,383 101.83 Trun 1,287 43.03 Tujetsch 1,811 133.92 Ilanz sub-district Municipality Population (31 Dec 2004) Area (km²) Castrisch 416 7.18 Falera 546 22.35 Flond 205 2.09 Ilanz 2,339 4.50 Laax 1,228 31.68 Ladir 117 7.21 Luven 204 6.83 Pitasch 119 10.81 Riein 65 15.82 Ruschein 356 12.54 Sagogn 640 6.95 Schluein 506 4.81 Schnaus 121 2.99 Sevgein 213 4.60 Valendas 306 22.79 Versam 271 16.77 Lumnezia/Lugnez sub-district Municipality Population (31 Dec 2004) Area (km²) Cumbel 270 4.45 Degen 254 6.74 Duvin 95 17.91 Lumbrein 424 37.83 Morissen 244 5.69 St. Martin 38 22.93 Suraua 291 24.20 Surcuolm 120 6.50 Vals 1,007 152.58 Vella 454 7.91 Vignogn 187 7.38 Vrin 270 71.23 Ruis sub-district Municipality Population (31 Dec 2004) Area (km²) Andiast 255 13.63 Obersaxen 798 61.54 Pigniu 43 17.98 Rueun 431 11.58 Siat 193 13.48 Waltensburg/Vuorz 393 32.32 Safien sub-district Municipality Population (31 Dec 2004) Area (km²) Safien 326 100.58 Tenna 90 11.28
